caption.p: HPLC chromatograms of the separated or fractionated compounds from 70% methanol extract of M. volcanica by polarity-stepwise elution CCC. ( A) HPLC chromatogram of the 70% methanol extract of M. volcanica; ( B– J) HPLC chromatograms of the separated or fractionated compounds by polarity-stepwise elution CCC. Moreover, the separated compounds are later identified as shikimic acid ( 2), gallic acid ( 3), protocatechuic acid ( 4), 4,4′-dihydroxy-3,3′-imino-di-benzoic acid ( 6), miquelianin ( 7), rutin ( 8), quercitrin ( 9), and quercetin ( 10).
